entities.name: squibs
entities.description: A group of people who are born without magical powers. Mentioned as a possible explanation for Filch's behavior.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: The caretaker of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. Described as trying to learn magic from a Kwikspell course and being bitter.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: One of Harry's friends. Described as giving a satisfied smile.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. Mentioned as someone who might try to frame Harry and Ron for something else.

entities.name: mrs norris
entities.description: The cat of Filch. Attacked by someone.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story. Described as seeing Filch scrubbing the message on the wall.

entities.name: mrs skower
entities.description: The creator of a magical cleaning product. Mentioned as having an all-purpose mess remover.

relationships.description: Filch is a Squib, which explains his behavior.
Filch is protecting Mrs Norris after she was attacked.
Filch and Snape have a conflict.
